title: tour: [The tree initialization is random? ]
body:
Context: https://tour.golang.org/concurrency/8

After read tree value to channel, I found these values:
Values for channel 1:
10
5
5
3
7
7
3
1
4
1
Values for channel 2:
7
4
9
9
4
2
5
2
8
10


They can not be same. So, how can I get a same result?
